General.Name: Oceanic Beverages Co Inc
General.Description: Oceanic Beverages Co., Inc. engages in the manufacture, wholesale, and retail of various soft drinks and beverages in Taiwan and internationally. It offers apple soda, guava juice, mineral water, and other related products. The company was founded in 1954 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 99, Chung Yang Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan
